mapper.select:
SELECT oli.oli_no, oli.olt_no, oli.title, oli.content, oli.img_path, oli.price, oli.level, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no),0) star_avg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_like oll WHERE oli.oli_no = oll.oli_no) like_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no) reply_cnt FROM online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_tag oltag, online_lecture_sub_type olst
GROUP BY oli.oli_no
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
ORDER BY like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY reply_cnt DESC
ORDER BY star_avg DESC
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(DISTINCT oli.oli_no) FROM online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_tag oltag, online_lecture_sub_type olst
